description:
Thank you for your interest in this course, my name is Yohann, I will be your instructor.

With this course, you get the full source code of the Freaking Math iPhone & iPad game clone where the player has one second to find if the math equation is correct or not. It’s simple enough that anyone can pick it up quickly, and it’s also very addictive by nature. It’s got all the elements to make it to the top charts, just like the flappy bird game, Plus it’s got an educational element on top of it!

This source code license already cost $100 on its own and you’re getting it with this course! I show you every single step you need to start, and I’m assuming you know nothing or very little,and I’m gonna help you succeed having your very own math quiz, published in the itunes app store, without having to write not even one single line of code!

This is one of the easiest app you’ll ever get to put your hands on. This is a perfect way to start your mobile app business or increase your app portfolio quickly.

Oh and by the way, I forgot to mention that the app that you will publish will bring you passive income because we’ve integrated 4 sources of revenues for you. This is a great course with a great source code, make the right decision and join us now. I’ll see you in the classroom.
title: Build a Math Quiz iOS Game, no coding, source code included
